com.att.research.xacml.std

Class StdMutableAttributeAssignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.StdMutableAttributeAssignment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeAssignment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JaxpAttributeAssignment

    public class StdMutableAttributeAssignment
extends java.lang.Object
implements AttributeAssignment
    Mutable implementation of the AttributeAssignment interface.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdMutableAttributeAssignment()
      Creates an empty StdMutableAttributeAssignment.
      StdMutableAttributeAssignment(Identifier categoryIn, Identifier attributeIdIn, java.lang.String issuerIn, AttributeValue<?> attributeValueIn)
      Creates a new StdMutableAttributeAssignment with the given Identifiers for the XACML Category and AttributeId, the given String issuer, and the given AttributeValue.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      The implementation of the AttributeAssignment interface must override the equals method with the following semantics: Two AttributeAssignments (a1 and a2) are equal if: a1.getAttributeId().equals(a2.getAttributeId()) AND a1.getCategory()>equals(a2.getCategory()) AND a1.getIssuer() == null && @a2.getIssuer() == null OR a1.getIssuer().equals(a2.getIssuer()) AND a1.getDataTypeId().equals(a2.getDataTypeId()) AND a1.getAttributeValue().equals(a2.getAttributeValue())
      Identifier getAttributeId()
      Gets the Identifier for the XACML Attribute that is assigned by this AttributeAssignment.
      AttributeValue<?> getAttributeValue()
      Gets the AttributeValue representing the XACML AttributeValue that is assigned to the Attribute by this AttributeAssignment.
      Identifier getCategory()
      Gets the Identifier for the XACML Category of the Attribute that is assigned by this AttributeAssignment.
      Identifier getDataTypeId()
      Gets the Identifier for the XACML data type of the AttributeValue that is assigned to the Attribute by this AttributeAssignment.
      java.lang.String getIssuer()
      Gets the String issuer of the XACML Attribute that is assigned by this AttributeAssignment.
      void setAttributeId(Identifier identifier)
      Sets the Identifier representing the XACML AttributeId to be assigned in this StdMutableAttributeAssignment.
      void setAttributeValue(AttributeValue<?> attributeValueIn)
      Sets the AttributeValue representing the value to be assigned to the XACML AttributeId associated with this StdMutableAttributeAssignment.
      void setCategory(Identifier identifier)
      Sets the Identifier representing the XACML Category of the AttributeId to be assigned in this StdMutableAttributeAssignment.
      void setIssuer(java.lang.String issuerIn)
      Sets the String representing the Issuer of the XACML Attribute to be assigned in this StdMutableAttributeAssignment.
      java.lang.String toString()

        getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • StdMutableAttributeAssignment

        public StdMutableAttributeAssignment()

      • StdMutableAttributeAssignment

        public StdMutableAttributeAssignment(Identifier categoryIn,
                             Identifier attributeIdIn,
                             java.lang.String issuerIn,
                             AttributeValue<?> attributeValueIn)
        Creates a new StdMutableAttributeAssignment with the given Identifiers for the XACML Category and AttributeId, the given String issuer, and the given AttributeValue.
        Parameters:
        categoryIn - the Identifier for the XACML Category of the new StdMutableAttributeAssignment
        attributeIdIn - the Identifier for the XACML AttributeId of the new StdMutableAttributeAssignment
        issuerIn - the String issuer for the XACML Attribute
        attributeValueIn - the AttributeValue for the new StdMutableAttributeAssignment
